FE-Editor

Based on EcmaScript 6 and transpiler Babel

Byfedojo.com

Easy grid based onMutliGrid.css

Quick Start:

  • Insert text into textarea
  • Choose element type
  • Click "Add Element"

Other Options:

  • "Add elements" - add random elements (still not working)
